E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 2/7/1991
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
CF Luis Olivera
in return for
LF Nestor Brito, 3B James More.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Capital City GM



Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1991
Subject: Harold Chubb learns new position
Harold Chubb has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Leftfield.
I would rate his skills as "C" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Kevin Slover
Dear Sir,
Kevin Slover shouldn't play at AA Patriot Games!
He has an AVG of .209 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Ronald Petrone
Dear Sir,
Ronald Petrone isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Patriot Games!
He has an AVG of .217, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
